name: Turbo Drift Racer
description:
Turbo Drift Racer is a highly realistic racing game where emphasis has been put on physics engine to provide the best racing experience.
Choose your car amongst Ford GT 2005, Ferrari Testarossa, Porsche 911 Turbo, Lamborghini Countach, Ford Pick-Up, Indie StockCar, Toyota Celica and Daf Truck.
Drive through different roads with beautiful sceneries, including night theme.

Key Features:
-16 tracks,day and night
-8 cars simultaneously
-different type of roads: drive under different conditions
-highly realistic driving physic engine
-game fully translated in your language

recommanded devices: iphone5 and above, ipad 4 and above
